title: Accomplished women
creator_credit: Jerry Kramer, Charles Braverman and Films Incorporated
brief_description: Six women, including Helen Reddy, who have made it to the top in their chosen fields discuss a wide range of topics from politics to personal feelings. Highlights changing attitudes of women about themselves. The other women include Shirley Chisholm (Member of the US Congress), La Donna Harris (Founder - Americans for Indian Opportunity), Katherine Graham (Business woman - Washington Post), Nikki Giovanni (Poet), Virginia Apgar (Pediatrics specialist).
